TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Qbhni_pgkla, title = Qbhni_pgkla, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qbhni_pgkla} }

S.FORM: Qbhni pgkla 預知鳥 Quri mshjil ni mdurug ka kuyuh Truku sbiyaw ga, rudan Truku sbiyaw o niqan ini kndka lnglungan dha, spowda dha uyas qbhni mkla ka ga mshjil ni manu ka qnseejiqan laqi rbnaw ga nbuyas bubu. qbhni mrmul 斑鳩 qbhuni mrmul ga nasi bhangan uyas na"em! em! "msa do klaun rudan ka kuyuh o ga empshjil da. puurung 貓頭鷹 (1) Nasi bhangan uyas puurung 是"ngiyaq! ngiyaq! "msa o klaun rudan ka ga nbuyas bubu o kuyuh ka laqi rbnaw. (2) Nasi bhangan uyas puurug 是" qur! qur! " msa o klaun rudan ka ga nbuyas bubu o snaw ka laqi rbnaw. (3) Qnlqian laqi rbnaw Mtucing ka laqi rbnaw o huya dha ksun pgkla seejiq ka miyah smiling qnlqian dha,nasi laqi snaw o "uwah" (男嬰sun dha pgkla seejiq smiyuk. nasi laqi kuyuh o "agih" sun dha pgkla seejiq smiyuk. (4) biqan qngqaya Hana ga mtucing laqi rbnaw o ini dha asi saay pgkla ka rudan kuyuh, kiya ka kiya ni niqn kingal ka pusu bi qngqaya saun dha mgay hlmadan kuyuh , kiya o pucing aji uri o qabang , saw nii hana dha pgklaun ka hlmadan kuyuh gaga dmuuy laqi da.

Qbhni pgkla 預知鳥 Qori mshjil ni mdorog ka koyoh Troko sbiyaw ga, rodan Troko sbiyaw o niqan ini kndka lnglongan dha, spowda dha oyas qbhni mkla ka ga mshjil ni mano ka qnseejiqan laqi rbnaw ga nboyas bobo. qbhni mrmol 斑鳩 qbhoni mrmol ga nasi bhangan oyas na"em! em! "msa do klaon rodan ka koyoh o ga empshjil da. poorong 貓頭鷹 (1) Nasi bhangan oyas poorong 是"ngiyaq! ngiyaq! "msa o klaon rodan ka ga nboyas bobo o koyoh ka laqi rbnaw. (2) Nasi bhangan oyas poorog 是" qor! qor! " msa o klaon rodan ka ga nboyas bobo o snaw ka laqi rbnaw. (3) Qnlqian laqi rbnaw Mtocing ka laqi rbnaw o hoya dha kson pgkla seejiq ka miyah smiling qnlqian dha,nasi laqi snaw o "owah" (男嬰son dha pgkla seejiq smiyok. nasi laqi koyoh o "agih" son dha pgkla seejiq smiyok. (4) biqan qngqaya Hana ga mtocing laqi rbnaw o ini dha asi saay pgkla ka rodan koyoh, kiya ka kiya ni niqn kingal ka poso bi qngqaya saon dha mgay hlmadan koyoh , kiya o pocing aji ori o qabang , saw nii hana dha pgklaon ka hlmadan koyoh gaga dmooy laqi da.
